short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension which helps you to set a limit on any website usage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Limit Distracting Sites is a simple chrome extension which provides functionality to set limit on the browsing time of a particular website tab. In today's world, it is really easy to get distracted to various online sites. The advance and intelligent systems continuously serve us different stuffs which is similiar to our interests and taste and unknowingly we tend to spend a long span of time on such websitse. Has this ever happened to you, that you thought lets see a 5 minute funny video on a platform and you end up wasting hours there. Don't be guilty, it happens with most of us almost every time. This extension is the solution to it. It simply asks, which website distract you and then for what span of time, do you want to view it. Hurray!! you are done, now browse to that site and after the time limit exceeds it will automatically popup a alert to you. And not just that, it will also bring a new motivational quote which will help you get back to your work and focus on it. Sounds interesting right!
